name: Eclipse+
description:
A 2D platformer game in which the character Luna & Sol slowly unravel the mystery of what has happened to them by exploring and solving the many obstacles on their way together!

-------------------- READ ME PLZ----------------------------------------------- 

- If the dialogue didn't work press the “cont.” using cursor to proceed.

- There are 4 endings, 2 bad ending, 1 normal ending, 1 hidden ending (hint: wait! Think A LONG TIME before making a decision)

-  If you get stuck, first try pressing 'Q' twice, if this didn't work,  use "Replay button" (in menu, call menu by pressing 'Esc'), which will reset the level.

Controls

A/D - Move left/right

Space - Jump/select

Left Ctrl - Destroy boxes

Q - Switch character

E - Operate lever

Esc - Open game menu
